document_data.name: ''Doom Hammer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Doom hammer''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[maul]], a "bringer of that which it is," found in the [[Western Heartlands]] of [[Faerûn]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Each successful strike with a ''doom hammer'' sent a deathly chill of impending doom down the target's bones. This condition prevented them from healing and stiffened their limbs enough to make it harder to aim and attack.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''doom hammer'' was in the hands of [[Grat]] the Trader, a [[goblin]] of the [[Cult of the Absolute]]. The weapon itself was looted from nearby locales targeted by the cult.
